div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1191 Phanae on Chios, Ionia, 1913 (244, 245) Burial: c. 450-440 B.C. (M) Contents: 59 AR. Pot hoard from excavations Chios: 15 didr.; 44 tetrob. Disposition: Athens AA 1915, p. 200 AJA 1920, p. 94 The references leave no doubt that Noe 244 and 245 are a single hd.
